showroom.address: UEM Sunrise Showcase 21, Jalan Kiara, Mont’Kiara, 50480 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
showroom.operating_hours: Weekdays: 9.30am to 5.30pm Weekends and Public Holidays: 10.00am to 5.00pm

description: There is a palpable feel to Solaris Parq, the next lifestyle horizon from the creator of Publika. Built on one of the last prime spots next to Publika, limitless living is reimagined with endless lifestyle choices within an urban park living concept.
features: Furnished With Kitchen Cabinets And Appliances
Rejuvenating Lounges And Sky Jacuzzi With KL Skyline View
Lifestyle Facilities At The Podium Including 50m Olympic-length Pool, Rain Spa And More.
Next To 2 Acres Urban Park With Proposed 1km Bicycle Lane
Living Next To A New Retail Mall Featuring First Cinema In Mont’Kiara And Dutamas.
